title: A picture is worth a thousand words
subtitle: Manage and export your reports easily, explore the full range of building inspection reports you can create.
paragraph: A crucial element when carrying out building inspections is undoubtedly the production of inspection reports. Whether it's to comply with local fire prevention rules and regulations, for health and safety audits, or for annual reporting obligations, our KEI application allows you to create a variety of reports. It offers a wide range of options to generate detailed, accurate, and compliant reports while making the process intuitive and quick.
